title.narrative: An enabling legislative and policy environment in line with CEDAW and Istanbul Convention is in place and translated into action

description.narrative: The aim of this outcome is to further strengthen efforts to reflect all recommendations stemming from international commitments and mechanisms into the Albanian legislation and policies as well as support governmental and non-governmental institutions to increase capacities to address EVAWG from a holistic, multi-stakeholder and crosscutting perspective by addressing at the same time existing social norms and stereotypes that enable all forms of violence.
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
